channel.title: [562] Two Attack Animations [562]
channel.description:
Okay, so, my Vine Whip is fucked up. Well just the attacking, everything else is fine.
So when I attack something with it, it does 2 attack anims for every one hit.
The hits are all fine and as they should be, but how can I make it so it's only one attack animation?
